alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 3:48PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A band of heavy snow will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, northern Madison, Jefferson and southwestern Cascade Counties through 445 PM MST... At 345 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a band of heavy snow along a line extending from 8 miles east of Lincoln to near Divide. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...A period of heavy snow and blowing snow. Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Visibility will be reduced to less than one mile at times. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, East Helena, Whitehall, Montana City, Wolf Creek, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Elkhorn State Park, Marysville, Craig, Elk Park, Clancy, Canyon Creek and Black Sandy State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 135 and 241. Interstate 90 between mile markers 235 and 256. Highway 200 between mile markers 77 and 92. Highway 12 between mile markers 29 and 52. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
